archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.2: A DLP programme should be established and applied to endpoint devices, systems and networks that process, store and transmit sensitive information (e.g. market strategies, payment card information, personal health information, source code, product designs and employee data).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
